head.header: Find a 24h farm vending machine near you

about.main_text: One Sunday I was about to start preparing lunch when I realized that I had already prepared the potatoes the day before. So I needed new ones, ideally from a local farmer. Since there are many farm shops and vending machines, I wanted to get potatoes there. Unfortunately, I couldn't find a website where I could search for it and find a map of matching machines near me. After I remembered a vending machine that I once drove past and did a bit of searching, the idea for this page came up afterwards.

disclaimer.text: Despite careful content control, I assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.
